label: Austin, TX 1 (City of Austin)
description:
This sample dataset was created from Austin's existing municipal data of streets, trails, sidewalks, crosswalks, and curb ramps. In terms of GATIS' tier structure, this data is Tier 2, though it contains some additional attributes above Tier 2. Note, this is only a clipped sample of the complete dataset; the full dataset can be downloaded using the following links:
  • Sample GATIS Edges (Austin, TX) Feature Layer
  • Sample GATIS Edges (Austin, TX) GeoJSON Download
  • Sample GATIS Nodes (Austin, TX) Feature Layer
  • Sample GATIS Nodes (Austin, TX) GeoJSON Download
See the full process here.

label: Seattle, WA (OpenStreetMap)
description:
This sample dataset was created from OpenStreetMap data in Seattle, WA. Note that the data is licensed under the Open Data Commmons Open Database License (ODbL). The conversion process does not account for all OpenStreetMap tags and the conversion may not work in other parts of the United States. The full dataset can be downloaded using the following links:
  • Sample GATIS Features
See the full process here. Note: There is no webmap for this dataset.
